text:
Mu myaka yashize, inkuru y’umuhanzi witwa Aimé Karame, uzwi cyane mu Rwanda no muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, yaturitse nk’inkuba mu itangazamakuru ry’isi yose. Aimé yari asanzwe azwi nk’umwe mu bahanzi bahanga ibihangano bikora ku mitima y’abanyarwanda n’abakunda umuziki muri rusange. Ibi byatumaga abarirwa mu bahanzi bubashywe kandi batandukanye n’abandi mu buryo bwiza.

Aimé yamenyekanye cyane kubera indirimbo ze zifite ubutumwa bwubaka, zakuraga amarangamutima menshi mu bakurikirana umuziki we. Indirimbo ze zasanze mu mpapuro z’urukundo, kubabarira, no gushyira imbere amahoro. Kugira ngo abashe gukora ibi, Aimé yakoreshaga impano ye idasanzwe yo kwandika neza, gucuranga gitari no kuririmba mu buryo budasanzwe.

Mu buryo butunguranye, Aimé Karame yafashe umwanzuro wo kwinjira mu isi ya politiki. Uko yatangaje umugambi we byo byatumye benshi bifata ku munwa. Mu ijambo rye yagejeje ku itangazamakuru, yavuze ati: "Umuziki ni ijwi ry'abaturage, ariko wowe ugomba kuba ijwi ricengera mu mitima yabo. Nshaka kuba umusemburo w'impinduka nziza kurushaho muri politiki y'igihugu cyacu."

Aimé yinjiye mu ishyaka ritari rizwi cyane, ariko ryari rifite intego y’imiyoborere ishingiye ku kwimakaza umuco, ubufatanye n’iterambere rirambye. Ubuhanga bwe mu kumvikanisha ibibazo bitandukanye n’uburyo yabyuturanga mu ndirimbo byamuhaye amahirwe menshi y’uko yakwigarurira imitima ya benshi ku kigero cya politiki.

Abafana b’uyu muhanzi nabo ntibatengushye mu gushyigikira uyu mwanzuro mushya wa Aimé, bagize uruhare rukomeye mu bikorwa byo kumwamamaza ndetse no kumurwanira ishyaka uko bashoboye. Abantu benshi bari bamaze kurabukwa ko Aimé afite ubushobozi bwo kuyobora no guhindura imyumvire y’abatuye igihugu akoresheje uburyo bwe bwihariye bwo gutanga ubutumwa.

Mu matora yabaye nyuma y’amezi make yonyine, Aimé Karame yatunguranye akwegukana intsinzi itunguranye ubwo yatorerwaga guhagararira akarere kavukamo mu nteko ishinga amategeko. Nubwo abenshi batamubonaga nk’umunyapolitiki urambye, we yerekanye ko impinduka arizo kihutirwa kandi ko ubuyobozi bugenwa n’impano y’umuntu yo kumva no guha abantu agaciro.

Mu gihe gito cyane amaze, yashoboye gukura abantu mu bwigunge, ashyiraho gahunda zitandukanye zitezimbere imibereho rusange, ndetse atangiza n’ubukangurambaga bwo gushyigikira ubuhanzi nk’imwe mu nkingi zubaka umuryango w'ubumwe.

Inkuru ya Aimé Karame yabaye isomo rikomeye ku isi yose cyane ko yakomeje kuririmbira abaturage akoresheje impano ye ndetse akaba umuyobozi w’icyitegererezo mu buryo bundi. Aimé yabaye icyitegererezo cy’umwe mu bantu badatinya kuvumbura impano zabo zitandukanye no kuzibyaza umusaruro mu guhindura isi.

Mu gihe cya vuba aha, inkuru itangaje yarakangutse ivugisha abantu benshi ku isi yose. Umuhanzi w'icyamamare, Kamari Ndushimiye, uzwi ku mazina y'ubuhanzi nka "K-Star", yinjije politiki mu buryo butunguranye kandi butamenyerewe. Kamari, wari umaze imyaka myinshi ku isonga muri muzika mu Karere ka Afurika y'Iburasirazuba, yatangajwe cyane n'icyemezo cye cyo kwinjira muri politiki. Uyu muhanzi yari azwiho indirimbo zikundwa cyane nka "Urukundo Rutagira Akagero" na "Izuba", zatumye aba icyamamare gikomeye mu karere no hanze yako.

Ubuhanga bwe mu guhanga indirimbo butuma yumvwa kandi akundwa na benshi, ndetse afite amagambo akora ku mitima y'abantu mu buryo bwihariye. Yaranzwe kandi n’ibitaramo bikomeye byakunzwe n’abatari bake, aho yazengurutse isi yongera gusangiza abafana be ubutumwa burimo urukundo, uburinganire n’umubano w’amahanga.

Icyemezo cya Kamari cyo kwinjira muri politiki cyaje nk'inkuba y'umutaka, cyane ko atigeze ashyira ku mugaragaro inyota yo kuyobora rubanda cyangwa iby'igihugu muri rusange. Yari aziyerekanye nk'ushishikajwe n'ugukangurira abantu kwishima no kubaka ubumwe binyuze mu bihangano bye.

Uyu mugambi wo kwinjira muri politiki ngo yatangiye kuwutekerezaho igihe yari mu bitaramo mu Burayi, aho yabonaga uburyo abandi bahanzi bari gukora ibindi bikorwa bifite aho bihuriye no gufasha rubanda bakoresheje ibyo bari bafite. Ibi byatumye atekereza uburyo nawe yakoresha ijwi rye ryakumvikanye cyane kugira ngo agire ingaruka nziza ku buzima bw’abantu.

Kamari yaje kwiyamamariza kuba Umudepite mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’igihugu cye, atangaza ko aharanira iterambere ry’umuco, uburezi bufite ireme, ndetse n’iterambere ry’urubyiruko binyuze mu gushyigikira impano zabo. Yagaragarije abaturage ibikorwa bye by'ubugiraneza yari amaze igihe akora mu bwiru, birinda abana ibibazo by’imirire mibi ndetse agafasha n’abahanzi b'abakiri bato kubona amahirwe yo kumenyekanisha impano zabo.

Uburyo bwe bwo kwiyamamaza bwari ubudatandukanye cyane n'uburyo yajyaga akoresha ibitaramo. Yakoreshaga inama zikomeye, aho yageragezaga kwerekana uburyo muzika ihuriye na politiki mu guharanira impinduka nziza. Abaturage baramushyigikiye bidasanzwe, cyane cyane urubyiruko rwabonaga mu byifuzo bye igisubizo ku bibazo byari bimaze igihe byugarije umuryango nyarwanda.

Ibitekerezo bitandukanye byaturutse mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu, aho bamwe batunguwe n'inyota ye yo kujya mu mishinga ikomeye nka politiki, mu gihe abandi bashimagizaga umuhate we ko ushobora kuzana agashya, umucyo n’ubwo bushobozi bwo guhuza abantu ku buryo bwihariye.

Bidateye kabiri, Kamari yabashije gutsindira intebe ye mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, aba ashimangiye ko umuziki n’ubuvugabutumwa byashoboraga kugira uruhare rutaziguye mu guhindura amateka y’igihugu. Ubwo yinjiraga mu Nteko, yahise akora imodoka y’impinduka zifatika, atangirana imishinga igamije guteza imbere urubyiruko, guteza imbere impano zabo ndetse no kuvugurura uburyo bwo gushyigikira umuco. Umunsi ku munsi, icyizere n'ibyiringiro muri Kamari byatangiye kubyara umusaruro ku gihugu cye, kandi ku isi hose hahoze hibazwa niba ashobora kuba ari urugero rwiza rw’umuhanzi wahinduye isi binyuze mu guhindura amateka y’igihugu cye byifashishije izindi mbaraga zitari iz’umuziki gusa.

Hari hashize igihe kinini umuhanzi Ntwari Aimable amamamaye mu ruhando rwa muzika nyarwanda ndetse n’iy’isi yose. Mu myaka icumi yari ishize, indirimbo ze zari zarashimishije abakunzi b'umuziki ku buryo budasanzwe, bituma amenyekana cyane mu karere no mu mahanga. Mu ndirimbo ze, Aimable yaririmbaga ku rukundo, amahoro, ubumwe n'iterambere, maze bituma aba ikirangirire mu gihugu ndetse no hanze yacyo.

Gusa ibintu byaje guhindura isura ubwo mu mpera z’umwaka ushize, Aimable yaje gutangaza ko yinjiye muri politiki. Ibi byari ibintu bitunguranye cyane, ku bakunzi be n’abanyarwanda muri rusange, kuko yari azwiho kwitandukanya na politiki, ahubwo agaharanira gutanga ubutumwa bw’ubumwe no gusigasira umuco binyuze mu buhanzi.

Kwiyemeza kwinjira muri politiki kwaje gufata intera nini ubwo yari amaze gushyigikirwa n’abantu benshi barimo abahanzi bagenzi be, abakunzi b’umuziki n’abagize sosiyete sivile. Aimable yaje guhura na bamwe mu bayobozi bakomeye b’igihugu nabo bamushyigikira, bamubwira ko ijwi rye ryafasha guteza imbere igihugu aherutse kubona igikombe cyo kuba umuhanzi w'icyitegererezo, atangaje ko ashaka guhindura no guteza imbere imibereho y'abenegihugu.

Ubwo yinjiraga muri politiki, Aimable yari afite gahunda yise "Ubwonko Nshya", aho yagaragajemo uburyo ashaka gufasha urubyiruko kubona imirimo iboneye, kunganira uburezi no kwita ku bakene. Icyegeranyo cy’iyi gahunda yatumye agira igikundiro imbere y'abatari bacye, cyane cyane mu rubyiruko rwari rwaramaze kumubonamo intwari.

Ntibyatinze kandi, Aimable yaje gutangaza ko aziyamamariza umwanya wa Perezida wa Repubulika mu matora yari ateganyijwe mu mezi make. Iki cyemezo cyatumye ashyigikirwa cyane, ndetse abatavuga rumwe na leta benshi bamubonamo umunyapolitiki w’intangarugero kandi ufite intego nziza. Aimable yasabye abafana be kumva neza impamvu y’iyo mpinduka, abasaba inkunga n’amasengesho.

Abamwungirije mu itsinda ry’ishyaka rye ryitwaga “Urumuri Nshya”, ryagiye rigaragara cyane mu bikorwa byo kubakira abatishoboye, gusura ibigo by’amashuri no gukorana n’amakoperative atandukanye. Ibi byatumye ryamamazwa cyane kandi rikomeza gukundwa n’abaturage.

Mu gihe cy’amatora, ibikorwa bye byarushijeho kumenyekana, maze abanyamakuru b'ibitangazamakuru bikomeye ku isi batangira gucukumbura iby’urugendo rwa Aimable mu muziki no muri politiki. Icyo gihe yaje kandi gutanga ikiganiro gikomeye mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’Umuryango w’Ubumwe bwa Afurika, aho yasobanuraga uburyo umuziki na politiki bishobora gukorana bigafasha mu guteza imbere imibereho y’abaturage.

Ibikorwa bye byatumye atsinda amatora ku bwiganze bugaragara, atangira kuyobora igihugu mu mpera z’umwaka. Mu mezi make amaze ayobora, amavugurura muri politiki y'ubukungu, uburezi n’imibereho myiza y'abaturage yatumye igihugu gishima kumugira umuyobozi.

Ubuhanga bwe mu gukora ibiganiro no guhuza imyemerere itandukanye byatumye ahora yubahwa kandi akunzwe n’abaturage. Aimable yahinduye isura y’umuhanzi, yerekana ko umuziki ushobora kuba urufunguzo rwo kugera kuri politiki ishobora guhindura imibereho y’abantu ku buryo buhamye kandi bw’igihe kirekire.

Hari ku mugoroba w'igitondo kimwe cyizuba giciriritse, ubwo abari batuye mu mujyi wa Kigali batungurwaga n'inkuru yacicikanye hose ku mbuga nkoranyambaga n'ibinyamakuru bitandukanye. Uwo munsi wari udasanzwe kuko byagaragaraga ko hari ikintu gikomeye cyabaye cyabujije abantu amahwemo. Iyo nkuru yari ijyanye n'umuhanzi ufite izina rikomeye mu gihugu no ku rwego mpuzamahanga wari ufite agashya.

Ni Simbi Nshuti, umuhanzi wakunzwe cyane kubera injyana ye ya Afrobeat na Reggae, akaba yarabashije kubaka izina rikomeye haba mu Rwanda no hanze yarwo. Simbi yari azwiho kuba umucuranzi w'ibihangano byubaka, afasha abatishoboye, kandi akunda kuvugira abatagira kivurira. Uyu muhanzi, ku buryo butigeze buteganywa n'umuntu n'umwe, yatangaje ko agiye kwinjira muri politiki, icyemezo cyatunguye benshi.

Icyo cyemezo cye cyatangiye kugenda kizenguruka ubwo abakunzi be babibonaga ku rubuga rwe rwa Instagram aho yari yanditse amagambo akomeye agira ati: "Igihe kirageze ngo nsangize amajwi yanjye mu zindi nzego. Nifatanya namwe muri uru rugamba rwo gushyira imbere ubwisanzure n'iterambere ry'abaturage." Aya magambo yahise atera urujijo ndetse n'amarangamutima atandukanye.

Ku mugoroba w'icyo gisheshwa cy'urume, Simbi yateguye ikiganiro n'itangazamakuru, maze avugira imbere y'imbaga y'abantu benshi, harimo n'abanyamakuru baturutse imihanda yose. Yatangaje ku mugaragaro ko aharanira kuzamura imibereho y'abaturage biciye mu kwinjira muri politiki, by'umwihariko mu ihuriro rya politiki, aho yari yiteguye gutangiza umuryango mugari uzibanda ku kunoza imibereho myiza y’abaturage, guteza imbere urubyiruko, no gutanga ijambo ku bantu bose cyane cyane abakunda ibihangano.

Mu ijambo rye yagize ati: "Ubuhanzi bwampaye urubuga rwo kuvugira abatagira kivurira nubwo bisaba byinshi birenze amagambo. Ni yo mpamvu nafashe icyemezo cyo kwinjira muri politiki kugira ngo ngere ku mpinduka zifatika. Nzi neza ko atari urugendo rworoshye, ariko hamwe nanyu, niyemeje kudacika intege."

Simbi Nshuti yahawe amashimwe menshi ndetse n'inkunga ikomeye atangira urugendo rwe rushya mu rwego rwa politiki. Abafana be bamusabaga kumenya kugumana umuco wo kuba intangarugero ati "Wadufashije guhumeka umuziki mwiza, imyemerere yawe mu kubaka igihugu iraturyohereza kandi twese turi kumwe nawe mu nkundo, mu rugamba rw'icyizere no mu kurogera ubuvandimwe."

Ibi byatumye benshi batangara ku ko uburyo urubuga rw'umuziki rushobora kuba ishoramari ryiza mu bikorwa bya politiki n'iterambere rusange, kandi uburyo Simbi yifashemo impinduka bigashyigikirwa n'abantu benshi, byabaye intandaro yo kwandika urundi rupapuro mu mateka y'igihugu.

Isi yose ya muzik ndetse n'abaryi bayo bari biteze ibigiye gukurikiraho mu rugendo rw'uyu muhanzi w'icyamamare wahindukiye intwari nshya mu rugamba rwa politiki, afite icyerekezo cyo gutuma ijwi ry'umuntu wese ryumvwa mu gihugu. Cyari igihe cy'amateka, aho ibyahanuwe byahindutse impamo, kandi abenshi bakaba barindiriye kumenya ibizakurikiraho mu rugamba rwe rushya.

Mu gihugu cya Karindwi, ahari imisozi miremire n’imigezi itemba ituje, havutse inkuru itunguranye yashimishije abayikurikiranira hafi bose ku Isi. Iyi nkuru ivuga ku muhanzi wamamaye cyane mu njyana ya Afrobeat, amazina ye nyakuri akaba ari Kavundi Moses, ariko benshi bamuzi ku izina ry’ubuhanzi nka "Mwezi Star."

Mwezi Star yari amaze imyaka icumi ari umwe mu bahanzi bakunzwe cyane muri Afurika, n’ibindi bice byo ku Isi kubera ubuhanga bwe mu gucuranga no guhimba indirimbo zifite amagambo akora ku mitima ya benshi. Usibye umuziki, Mwezi Star yari azwiho no gutanga ubutumwa bw’amahoro n’ubwiyunge mu bihugu bitandukanye, akaba yari afite umutima ukunda gufasha abakene n’abatishoboye.

Ariko muri uyu mwaka, inkuru yabaye kimomo ubwo Mwezi Star yatangazaga ko yinjiye muri politiki, aharanira kuba Perezida wa Karindwi. Ibi byabaye igitangaza gikomeye kandi benshi bakibwiye ko ari inzozi zitashoboka, kubera ko nta n’umwe wari warigeze atekereza ko Mwezi Star ashobora kuva mu buhanzi ngo yinjire muri politiki.

Abakurikiranira hafi iyi nkuru batangajwe n’uburyo uyu muhanzi yinjiranye imbaraga muri politiki, aho yateguye gahunda yise "Impinduka Nshi" ifite intego zirimo kwimakaza demokarasi, kuzamura ubukungu bw'igihugu no guteza imbere uburezi. Mwezi Star yakomozaga mu mbwirwaruhame ze uburyo abahanzi bazi neza kwifatanya na rubanda no guhuza abo batandukanye, bityo akaba yizeye ko azaba Perezida mwiza ushobora guhuza Karindwi igatera imbere.

Ihuriro ry’amatangazo ye ryaganishaga ku rwego rwo hejuru ku isi kuburyo yabashije kwegeranya ubushobozi bwinshi aho yabaye umuyobozi ubitse byinshi kurusha abandi. Mu rwego rwa politiki, abantu bakuze babona muri Mwezi Star umwe mu bahanga bazanye impinduka zitagira ingano mu mikorere ya politiki y’igihugu.

Aho yarangije gutangiza ibikorwa byo kwiyamamaza, Mwezi Star yatangiye guhamagarira ibihumbi by’abaturage mu mijyi no mu byaro bataripfana, bava mu manama y’umuziki bamukomera amashyi. Bari baje kumva uyu muhanzi wahindutse umuririmbyi w’amajwi ya politiki bashaka kumva birushijeho.

Iyi nkuru yatumbitse mu gihe gito cyane, ndetse inagaragara mu bitangazamakuru mpuzamahanga, aho banyuzagamo bakanamuvuga nk’umwe mu bahanzi ba mbere b’abanyabigwi bigeze kubigeraho. Kuba Mwezi Star yarahinduye imikorere mu buryo butunguranye, byatumye benshi batangira kongera kwisuganya no gutekereza ku bigaragara nk’ uruhare rw’abahanzi mu mpinduka za politiki ku isi hose.

N’ubwo hari abacyeka ubushobozi bwa Mwezi Star, ukwizera bifitemo kw’abamushyigikiye byateraga n’abandi kumukurikira, bakamubona nk’urugero rwiza rw’abahindura isi bifashishije impano basanganywe. Ariko nta waba ukurikira politiki yo muri Karindwi atazi ko uyu ahawe amahirwe, uyu muhanzi witwa Mwezi Star azaba yanditse amateka mashya, akaba yarahirwa cyane ndetse n'abantu bakunde abahanzi babona ko nabo bashobora kugira icyo bakora gikomeye mu byo guhindura ubuzima n’umurage bihugu byabo byasigiwe.

Mu gihugu cya Nyirarubuga, mu mwaka wa 2025 habaye ihinduka rikomeye mu ngeri zitandukanye zamamaye cyane, zirimo ubuhanzi na politiki. Byose byatangiriye ku muhanzi uzwi cyane witwa Kayitare Mwiza, wamenyekanye kubera ijwi rye ry’indahangarwa ndetse n’ubuhanga yari afite mu gusakaza ubutumwa burangwa n’amahoro n’ubwiyunge mu ndirimbo ze.

Mwiza yari amaze imyaka irenga icumi mu ruhando rw’umuziki, aho yegukanye ibihembo bitandukanye ndetse akagira ibitaramo byinshi byitabirwa n’abakunzi be baturutse imihanda yose. Umuziki we wanyuraga imitima y’abatari bake. Ariko, hari impande zo muri sosiyete zabonaga ko ubutumwa bwe bwari bwarenze urwego rw’umuziki bugakwiye no kugera mu zindi nzego z’ubuzima bw’igihugu, cyane cyane politike.

Icyaje gutangaza abantu cyane, ni uko mu gihe bamwe batekerezaga ko Kayitare yasimbukira ku mwanya w’ubuyobozi bw'Ihuriro ry'Abahanzi b’igihugu, uyu muhanzi yafatanyije n’inshuti ze zo mu ishuri rikuru yigagaho, batangira urugendo rwo kunga rubanda binyuze muri politiki. Mu kwezi kwa Mutarama 2026, Kayitare yatangaje ku mugaragaro ko yinjiye mu ishyaka rishya ryakorewe mu mushinga we ryitwa "Ukuri n’Iterambere", arifuza guhindura amateka y’igihugu cye mu buryo bwo guteza imbere demokarasi, umuco w'ubwubahane n'impinduka zirambye.

Intego yaryo yari uguhuriza hamwe ibitekerezo by’abantu bose, aho batari kureba ku mashyaka abiri atavuga rumwe nk’uko byari bimenyerewe, ahubwo bashaka gukora cyane ngo bazamure imibereho y’abaturage binyuze mu bufatanye n’ibiganiro bidafite imipaka. Kayitare yagize ati: "Umuziki wanjye wamamazaga amahoro n’imibanire myiza, ariko ubu ndashaka guhindura ibyo ngarukamo mvuga, ngaharanira ko ibyo nari nararirimbye nkomora ibitekerezo ku bikorwa."

Inkuru y'ukwinjira muri politiki kwa Kayitare yamenyekanye hose, kandi benshi mu baririmbyi bagenzi be baramushyigikiye, bemeza ko ari intwari yo guharanira impinduka. Mu gihe gito, ishyaka rye ryabonye abayoboke benshi, cyane cyane urubyiruko rwari rusanzwe ruhura n’utugorane mu mibereho yabo ya buri munsi.

Mu gihe yiyamamarizaga kuba umudepite, ibikorwa bye ntibyafungiraga mu masangano ya politiki gusa; ahubwo yakomeje no gutanga umusanzu we mu ndirimbo, aho nowe nandikaga indirimbo zatumye abantu bamenya akamaro ko kugira ijwi ryabo. Yatsinze amatora y'ubudepite ku majwi adasanzwe, ahinduka icyitegererezo mu gihugu no mu karere. Mu mwaka wa 2027, Kayitare yagizwe Minisitiri w’Uburezi mu gihugu, aho yambariye urugamba rwo kuzamura ireme ry’uburezi mu mashuri yose, cyane cyane ku bana bo mu byaro.

Uku kurwana ku gihugu cye kwatumye ashimwa n’impande zose kandi agaragara kenshi mu nama mpuzamahanga nk’umuntu w'indashyikirwa mu kongera bumwe hagati y'abantu bitaye ku iterambere rirambye ry’abaturage. Kuva icyo gihe, ibendera ry’igihugu cyabo ryamaze kuba icyitegererezo cy'inzira y'impinduka mu mahoro—ati: "Abahanzi n'abanyapolitiki, twese hamwe dushobora kugera ku ndoto zamagana z'Isi nziza."

Mu gihugu cya Faranga cyari kimenyerewe mo umuco utangaje w’abahanzi n’abanyapolitiki, haherutse kuvuka inkuru idasanzwe ivugwa hirya no hino ku isi. Umuhanzi w’icyamamare, Izuba Nshya, icyamamare mu njyana ya hip hop no mu mbyino za kizungu, yafashe icyemezo gitunguranye cyo kwinjira muri politiki, ibintu benshi batari biteze na gato. Mu ntangiriro, abandi banyapolitiki bumvaga ari igitangaza, benshi bamuzi nk'umwe mu bahanzi bakomeye ku isi, ufite izina rikomeye mu muziki wa ruharwa.

Izuba Nshya yabanje gukora ubuhanzi bwamumenyekanishije cyane, aho yatsindira ibihembo byinshi ku rwego mpuzamahanga, nka Grammy Awards ndetse akanakora ibitaramo byitabirwa n'imbaga itabarika ku isi hose. Ariko nyuma y’igihe kinini mu buhanzi, yatangiye kwerekana ubushake bwe mu bikorwa by'iterambere ry'igihugu, aho yagiye yigisha urubyiruko akamaro ko kugira uruhare mu bibakorerwa.

Ku itangazo ry’itangazamakuru yagize ati: “Nakoze byinshi mu muziki kandi nishimira ibyo nagezeho. Ariko ubu ndashaka guhindura no gutanga umusanzu wanjye mu kuzamura igihugu cyacu, ndashaka ko ijwi ry'urubyiruko rihabwa agaciro kandi ibisubizo bifatika bigashakirwa ibibazo bibugarije.”

Izuba Nshya yinjiranye ingufu nyinshi mu ishyaka rya "Twese hamwe", rishya ryashinzwe kugira ngo rivugurure politiki zo mu gihugu cya Faranga. Yizeye ko ubwamamare bwe ndetse no gukundwa n’urubyiruko bizatuma yunganira gahunda ze ziharanira iterambere rirambye no kubaka igihugu gisangiwe na bose.

Maze igihe gito ashyize ahagaragara imishinga ikubiye muri gahunda ye ya politiki, yibanda cyane ku burezi bw'ubuziranenge, guteza imbere ikoranabuhanga, ndetse no kongera umubano n'amahanga. Yagiye akoresha inama mpuzamahanga zihuriza hamwe urubyiruko bo mu bihugu bitandukanye, yungurana nabo ibitekerezo ku buryo bashobora gutanga umusanzu mu iterambere ry’isi.

Abenshi mu baturage ba Faranga bamwakiriye neza, bavuga ko umuco we wo kuvugira abasanzwe batagira ijambo mu mikorere y’igihugu cyabo uzazana impinduka nziza ndetse ukemure ibibazo byari byarabaye akarande. Nyuma y'ukwezi kumwe gusa, Izuba Nshya yatangiye guhura n’abaturage hirya no hino mu gihugu, abakangurira kuza gusangira igitekerezo no kubaka ubwumvikane mu bushorishori bwa politiki y’igihugu.

Inkuru y’iyi mpinduka itunguranye yabaye imbarutso y’ubutumwa bw’ubumwe yayohererezaga cyane cyane urubyiruko rwo hirya no hino ku isi, ruryoherwa n'ubutwari bwe bwo gutinyuka kugera mu ishingiro ry'ibyemezo bitari byarigeze bigerwaho n’undi muhanzi wabayeho mu gihugu cya Faranga.

Uko iminsi igenda ihita, ahatangirira guca imigani mu baturage ngo "Guhindura umuziki kuko ba baturage bashyize umuziki imbere,” bisobanuye guhindura ibintu bihereye aho bigezweho, kandi "kubishyira mu bikorwa”, ibigira intandaro yo gushyira mu bikorwa rwose ibyo byeze iminwa.

Twigire hamwe, kuko inkuru ya Izuba Nshya ni urugero rwo gucengera mu ivugurura nk’ikibazo atari ikiburamo, ariko no kuri duhora twibaza ngo "bizagenda bite ejo, niba twamuhaye amahirwe akahagararira abatagira ijwi rya vuba?". Nabyo ni ibihe bindi mu ivugurura rindi ritabura ku isi yacyarwaye.

Mu gihugu cy'imisozi igihumbi, umuhanzi w'icyamamare cyane witwaga Kamariza yari atangiye urugendo rushya yinjira muri politiki. Kamariza yari azwi cyane mu muziki w'injyana gakondo, aho indirimbo ze zasusurutsaga imitima myinshi kubera ubutumwa bwuzuyemo amahoro, urukundo, n'ubumwe. Yari afite ijwi ryiza cyane ryashimishaga buri wese wari ufite amahirwe yo kumwumva. Ibyamamare n'abakunzi b'umuziki mu gihugu hose bamwubahaga bitavugwa.

Icyizere cyari cyose igihe Kamariza yamenyeshaga isi ko agiye kwinjira muri politiki. Kuva yatangira kugera ku mpinga y'umuziki, nta muntu wari ukeka ko yatekereza gukora impinduka nk'iyo. Yatangaje icyemezo cye mu itangazo ryamamaye cyane, aho yasobanuye ko intego ye yari uguharanira iterambere ry'igihugu cye, cyane mu guteza imbere umuco n'ubuhanzi.

Kwinjira muri politiki kwa Kamariza byakiriwe neza n'abantu batari bake, cyane cyane urubyiruko, rwabonaga ko ari amahirwe adasanzwe yo kuba umuhanzi ukomeye yafatanya nabo mu guharanira impinduka nziza. Ariko kandi, hari n'abari bamusabye gusubira mu murongo yari asanzwemo, batekereza ko yareka abahanga muri politiki bagakomeza akazi kabo.

Mu mwaka wa mbere yinjira muri politiki, Kamariza yatangiye gahunda ye nshya yo kuzenguruka igihugu hose aha ibiganiro. Ibyo biganiro byibanze ku mahoro no kwishyira hamwe, bimufasha kumenya neza ibibazo by'abaturage afite intego yo gukemura. Abaturarwanda benshi bakomeje kumva ijwi rye rihamagarira ubumwe.

Mu matora y’abadepite, Kamariza yatsinze ku bwiganze, ahinduka intumwa y’umuryango. Yagaragaje impinduka zikomeye mu bikorwa bye, ashimangira ko n'ubwo kuba umuhanzi bitandukanye cyane no gukora politiki, impano zombi zifite byinshi bihuriyeho; ubuhanga mu gutanga ubutumwa no guhuza abantu.

Imyaka ye mu nteko ishinga amategeko yagaragajwe n’imishinga mizima ku rubyiruko, umuco, na siporo, ndetse n’inkunga ku bahanzi bagenzi be. Kamariza yabaye icyitegererezo cy’uko umutima w’umuhanzi ushobora kugeza igihugu ku ntambwe yisumbuye mu iterambere rirambye.

Mu gihe cyose cya manda ye, yagaragaje ko umuhanzi atari uw'ibitaramo gusa, ahubwo ashobora no kuba umuyobozi mwiza, ugafasha kurushaho guhuza abantu binyuze mu mbaraga z'ubuhanzi n'umurage gakondo. Byageze ubwo Kamariza yimakaje impinduka zidasanzwe muri politiki, aba umwe mu bayobozi bakunzwe cyane mu mateka y'icyo gihugu.

Mu gihugu cy'imisozi igihumbi n'amazi y'ibiyaga binini, hari umuhanzi wari umaze igihe yiganje mu mitima y'abantu. Uyu muhanzi, wamenyekanye ku izina rya Mugenzi Kwizera, yari afite ijwi ry'umwimerere ryakururaga imitima y'ab'ingeri zose cyane cyane urubyiruko. Indirimbo ze zari zuzuye ubutumwa bw'amahoro, urukundo, n'ubumwe, bikaba impamvu nyamukuru yatumye amenyekana henshi mu gihugu ndetse no hanze yacyo.

Icyakora, nubwo yari afite umwuga wakundwaga na benshi, Mugenzi yatangiye kubona ko hari impinduka zikeneye gukorwa mu gihugu. Yabonaga ko urubyiruko rutagira ijwi rifatika mu miyoborere, kandi ari bo bafite ejo hazaza mu biganza byabo. Ibyo byamuhaye igitekerezo gikomeye cyo kwinjira muri politiki, icyemezo cyatunguranye cyane abakunzi be.

Mu itangazo ryatambutse mu binyamakuru byinshi no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, Mugenzi Kwizera yamenyesheje ko agiye kwiyamamariza umwanya w'intumwa ya rubanda mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko. Impamvu nyamukuru y'uku kwiyamamaza kwe, nk'uko yabisobanuye, yari ugushyira imbere imigabo n'imigambi ishyigikira iterambere ry'urubyiruko, imibereho myiza y'abaturage, no kugeza amajwi y'abadafite ijwi imbere y'abafata ibyemezo.

Abanje kugira ubwoba ko ibikorwa bye bya muzika bitazavana n'ihurizo rishya yihaye, yeretse abakunzi be ko ashoboye guhuza ibyo byombi, aho yatangiye ibikorwa byo kwamamaza binyuze mu ndirimbo zasangaga abantu mu bikorwa bitandukanye byo kwamamaza. Indirimbo ze nshya, zuzuye ubutumwa bwo guhindura isi, zasangaga abayoboke be mu bitaramo byose byo kwamamaza kandi uko ibikorwa byiyongeraga ni ko n'inkunga yakomezaga kwiyongera.

Ku munsi w'amatora, Abanyarwanda bagaragaje kugira icyizere mu muhanzi wagize intambwe idasanzwe, maze Mugenzi Kwizera atungura benshi atsinda amatora ku bwiganze bw'amajwi. Abantu benshi, yaba urubyiruko n'abasheshe akanguhe, bari bafite amashyushyu yo kubona ibyo Mugenzi yari yaravuze bigerwaho, kandi yari afite imigambi myiza mu ngeri nyinshi nka: gukemura ibibazo by'abayisilamu, kuvuganira umuco, no kwigisha urubyiruko kwikora mu nda.

Mu gihe gito akimara kubona umwanya mu nteko, Mugenzi yahise ashyiraho gahunda zitandukanye zigamije iterambere ry'abaturage, yongeza ijwi rye muri gahunda z'amajyambere, kandi abantu benshi babonaga ko impinduka arazikora. Abatari bake baratangaye bibaza kugeza aho impamvu umuhanga mu guhanga yakwihindurira umunyapolitiki. 

Ubwiganze bw’abamushyigikiye bwatumye abatari bacye bamenya ko umuhanzi w'icyamamare Mugenzi Kwizera atari umuntu w'ikinamico yo gukina politiki, ahubwo ari umuntu ufite ubwitange bwo guhindura ubuzima bwa benshi. Ni gute ibintu bizagenda bitunganwa bikazamenyekana mu gihe kiri imbere, ariko ibyo azageraho bizasigara mu mitima myinshi nk'urugero rw'uko umuhanzi ashobora kugira uruhare rukomeye mu buzima bw'igihugu.

Hari hashize igihe kitari gito umuhanzi w'icyamamare, Karabo Nyamunsi, akomeje kwigarurira imitima y'abakunda umuziki haba mu gihugu cye ndetse no hanze yacyo. Nyamunsi yari azwiho impano idasanzwe mu guhanga indirimbo cyane cyane izishingiye ku gukundana n'iziririmbye mu njyana ya afrobeat, bikamuhesha ibihembo byinshi ku rwego mpuzamahanga.

Igihe kimwe, ubwo yari kumwe n'inshuti ze mu bitaramo bikomeye byaberaga i Kigali, Nyamunsi yatangaje amakuru atunguranye. Yasohotse ku rubyiniro nyuma y'igitaramo cyari cyuzuye abafana bari baje kumureba, ahita yishingikiriza indangururamajwi aravuga ati, "Abakunzi banjye ndabashimira ku rukundo mumpa, ariko ubu igihe kirageze ngo duhindure amateka. Ubuhanzi bwanjye bwarampaye, ariko nkeneye guhindura imibereho yacu binyuze muri politiki."

Iyi nkuru yacicikanye vuba mu bitangazamakuru n’imbuga nkoranyambaga, abantu benshi bibaza niba Nyamunsi ashoboye gusimbuka umuziki akinjira mu isi ya politiki. Mu kwezi gukurikiyeho, yagaragaye yitabira inama zitandukanye ziganirirwamo ibibazo byugarije urubyiruko n'imbogamizi zo guteza imbere umuco wa Afurika.

Karabo Nyamunsi yatangiranye ingufu abandi bahanga bibonamo, inama zikomeye zakurikiranye uburyo bwo guhindura imibereho y'abaturage binyuze mu dushya n'ikoranabuhanga. Imigambo ye ishingiye ku ntego zo guteza imbere urubyiruko n’umurimo byatumye izina rye rikomeza kuvugwa mu gihugu hose.

Nyuma y'umwaka umwe gusa, yatangiye ibikorwa byo kwiyamamaza ku mwanya wa Perezida wa Repubulika, afite intego yo guteza imbere uburezi, ubuvuzi kuri bose, n'ubukungu bushingiye ku ruhererekane rw'agaciro ruhamye.

Mu matora yabaye mu buryo butunguranye, Karabo yatsinze ku majwi aruta ay'abandi bakandida bose. Abaturage bitabiriye ari benshi, bashyigikira impinduka zazanwe n'umuhanzi wabo wamamaye cyane. Kugera uyu munsi, ubuyobozi bwe bwaharanira iterambere rirambye, kandi nk'uko yabitangaje ku munsi w'intsinzi ye, "Nje hano ku bw'urukundo n'ishyaka byo gusigasira ahazaza hacu."

Inkuru ndende y'ukuntu Karabo Nyamunsi yavuye mu buhanzi akaba Perezida wa Repubulika ishobora kumvikana nko mu nzozi, ariko ni urugero rukomeye rw'uko ubushake bw'umuntu bushobora guhindura isi. Kuba umuhanzi byamubereye umusingi ukomeye, none ubu igihugu cye kigerwa ku mashyi, kubera umuyobozi utanga icyerekezo gishya.
